page.title: 17Religion, New Galloway
page.content: There is a Church of Scotland situated on the northbound road on the outskirts of the village. The Reverend D. McKay officiates.He is the minister to Kells, Balmaghie and Balmaclellan parishes. There are 13 Elders in Kells who help the minister in his work e.g. home visits, communion bearers. The parishoners take it in turn to provide the flowers for the altar each Sunday.Balmaghie and Kells swap Church times every 6 months to try and accommodate the farming community. Balmaclellan, a very small parish,worships on the first Sunday of each month.There is a Bible class, Sunday_School, Women's Guild.The minister is, also, the School chaplain.Rev. Banks is minister in the church of England.There is no Roman Catholic Church and few Catholics.Those who are worship in C.D
